```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r text}
print("This is a test of print()")
```

```{r plot}
data <- data.frame(x = rnorm(50, 3, 23))
data$y = .3*data$x - .1*data$x^2 + rnorm (50, 0, 15)

ggplot(data, aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth() +
  coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) +
  theme_bw()
```
